title: Leading banks by market capitalization in Italy 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Company Name in the x axis and Market capitalization in million euros in the y axis.
The Market capitalization in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo and lowest at Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.
There is a difference of 37282.07 between the maximum Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo and minimum Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Company Name, and Market capitalization in million euros in each Company Name on the y axis.
The Market capitalization in million euros is highest at Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo and lowest at Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company Name in the x axis and Market capitalization in million euros in the y axis.
The Market capitalization in million euros is highest at Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo and lowest at Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.
The highest value at Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo is 49.94x times more than the lowest value at Banca Popolare di Sondrio.
The Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo has the highest Market capitalization in million euros, followed by UniCredit, and Mediobanca. Down to the Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio which is the lowest.
The Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio tends to be 4.28 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Company Names, we get total 88903.91.
